同道！这本也对我影响很大！我真的好喜欢汉娜！


Yup. The pleasure is all mine. I know it's none of my business, and I hope you don't mind me saying this. But may I recommend that you take some time to read Aristotle's Nicomachean Ethics. It might bring you peace and help you understand, in a more reflective fashion, your troubles and questions lately.
